France: Chilperic died.  He was succeeded by Theuderic IV, Dagobert III's son.
Germany: Chilperic II died. He was succeeded by Dagobert III's son Theuderic IV. Battle of Toulouse (721): An Aquitainian force broke an Umayyad siege of Toulouse.
Japan: The Hayato rebellion ends after a year and half of fighting, marking the complete subjugation of Southern Kyushu.
